hymn.title: But verily God hath heard me

layout.singingstanza: But ver -- i -- ly God hath heard me; He hath at -- tend -- ed to the voice of my prayer. Bless -- ed be God, Who hath not turned a -- way My prayer, nor His mer -- cy from me.

lyrics.stanza: But verily God hath heard me; He hath attended to the voice of my prayer. Blessed be God, Who hath not turned away My prayer, nor His mercy from me.
